thread.title: Ex Bigg Boss Contestant, Bani J, Posts A Picture Of Boyfriend Yuvraj Thakur Putting All Breakup Rumours To Rest
thread.title_full: Ex Bigg Boss Contestant, Bani J, Posts A Picture Of Boyfriend Yuvraj Thakur Putting All Breakup Rumours To Rest

title: Ex Bigg Boss Contestant, Bani J, Posts A Picture Of Boyfriend Yuvraj Thakur Putting All Breakup Rumours To Rest
text:
facebook 357 SHARES 
Bani J's relationship status has been in the news ever since she's stepped out of the Bigg Boss house. The VJ was quite close to television actor Gaurav Chopra inside the house, and rumors were rife that they both were planning to take their relationship forward outside the house. Bani went on to post a Snapchat video of her and Gaurav meeting for coffee, calling him the first person she met after she got out of the house. Yuvraj's Instagram post soon after, on moving on was hinting towards a breakup too. 
Bani hasn't been responding to any of the allegations, however she took to Instagram a few days ago and shared a picture of Yuvraj with a cute caption. A post shared by ⚡Lady RocknRolla ⚡ (@banij) on Mar 12, 2017 at 10:51pm PDT 
Guess that's her way of asking everyone to back off?
